item.title: By: brian
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: <i>So we say, we always say in the Black Panther Party, that they can do anything they want to us. We might not be back, I might be in jail, I might be anywhere. But when I leave, you can come out there, with the last words on my lips, I am a revolutionary and you're going to have to keep on saying that. You're going to have to say that I am a proletariat. I am the people, I'm not the pig. You got to make a distinction.</i><br/><br/>Sometimes drawing lines can be really productive...<br/><br/>... not to mention <a HREF="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QtORI3ZlPeg" REL="nofollow">powerful</a>
item.content:encoded:
So we say, we always say in the Black Panther Party, that they can do anything they want to us. We might not be back, I might be in jail, I might be anywhere. But when I leave, you can come out there, with the last words on my lips, I am a revolutionary and you’re going to have to keep on saying that. You’re going to have to say that I am a proletariat. I am the people, I’m not the pig. You got to make a distinction.

Sometimes drawing lines can be really productive…

… not to mention powerful
